results.description: Develop applications with LlamaIndex and Microsoft Foundry Note This document refers to the Microsoft Foundry (classic) portal. 🔍 View the Microsoft Foundry (new) documentation to learn about the new portal. results.title: Azure Database for PostgreSQL documentation landing page - Azure Database for PostgreSQL
results.description: Azure Database for PostgreSQL documentation Azure Database for PostgreSQL is a fully managed, AI-ready Database-as-a-Service (DBaaS) offering built on the open-source PostgreSQL engine, designed to support mission-critical workloads with predictable performance, robust security, high availability, and seamless scalability. Beginners guide to Azure.
